addresses.name: Agent EOA
addresses.description: This is the ethereum_private_key.txt wallet in the pett_agent (main agent code). It also the owner of the Agent Safe.

addresses.name: Multisig aka Master Safe
addresses.description: This GnosisSafeProxy, also known as AI Agent Safe Multisig, is the multisig that will be used to perform calls from the Agent EOA.
addresses.todo: From the Agent EOA call execTransaction on Multisig above with the method recordAction() on the ActionRepo contract to register correctly actions/transactions performed by the agent.

addresses.name: Service Registry Token Utility
addresses.description: Olas token, can be whatever ERC20

addresses.name: Action Repository
addresses.description: This is the action repository contract called by the agent to register actions/transactions performed.

owner.description: The owner of the action repository contract
owner.note: Can be whatever address, we will use the Agent EOA for now

signer.note: The address of the main signer that will be used to sign the transactions for the action repository contract.

addresses.WARNING: The multisig will be the one that will perform the calls to the action repository contract.

addresses.name: Activity Checker
addresses.description: This is the contract that will be used to check if the agent is active and eligible for rewards.

owner.description: The owner of the activity checker contract
owner.note: Can be whatever address, we will use the Agent EOA for now

livenessRatio.description: The liveness ratio captures the number of agent multisig transactions per second. It is the minimum number of transactions the **agent multisig** needs to perform in order to pass the liveness check and earn a reward
livenessRatio.note: For now we will use 8 txs per day (as an example). The agent executes 1 tx every ~7 mins so a user needs to have the agent running for around 1 hour (8 * 0.5)
livenessRatio.WARNING: we need to decrease this number; 24 txs. need to change the interval to be 5 mins and then change the liveness to be -> 8 * 10^18 / (24 * 60 * 60) = 92592592592592 to be 40 mins to unlock the agent.

addresses.name: Staking Contract
addresses.description: This is the staking contract that will be used to stake the agent.
addresses.note: After deploying it, we need to deposit OLAS to initialize the staking. ALSO, we need a CRON job to call the checkpoint() function every 12-24 hours to allow the users to claim the rewards.
